article_text:
Curbing smartphone use at work

Meet some of the 'Hackers'

01:18

article_metadata.description: The old-fashioned house call had all but disappeared by 1980. But now, startups and their smartphone apps let people in New York, LA and San Francisco summon a doctor.
article_metadata.title: Bringing back the house call: Apps in some big cities let you summon a doctor | The Kansas City Star
